name: Reddit Feel Good ( old.reddit.com )
description: Remove all the cruft from downvote arrows and karma on main page and comments for a cleaner, simpler look on the left hand side of threads.
additional_info:
NOTE: You can still go to your user page to see the "karma".

ONLY FOR *old.reddit.com*

UPDATE Aug 2021

- Fixed for *old.reddit.com* url

UPDATE July 2017

- Fixed http > https

v1.0

- Hides scores from submissions, hides karma next to username, and from all comments.

- Hides the ranks & down arrows. Re-aligns the upvote arrow so it looks nice next to the submissions.


I have hidden the scores because it's information overload. You can see if something is a "hot topic" simply with the number of comments.

Focus on content. Upvote what you like. Ignore the rest.

That's it.
